help_document.overview: Learn how to access and view Affymetrix array information within SBEAMS plus how to start analyzing microarray data.

summary.name: Down Load Affy Files
summary.description: Learn how to download Affymetrix data from SBEAMS

summary.name: Upload Data
summary.description: Learn how data is loaded into SBEAMS, either from Affy arrays used in-house or by loading external data sets

summary.name: Annotating Sample or Array Information
summary.description: Learn where and how to update Sample and Array information

summary.name: Analyze Affymetrix Data
summary.description: Learn about the currently supported ways to perform analysis

summary.name: Perform Simple Queries
summary.description: Gene Intensity values can be viewed in gray scale by querying project and arrays of interest with affy probe_set_ids, gene symbols/names or accession numbers

summary.name: Perform Advanced Queries
summary.description: Search and view probe intensity values from one or many projects.

summary.name: View Project Home page
summary.description: Go to the Microarray ProjectHome page to see if a project of interest has any data for Affymetrix, two color arrays or any GetExpression result sets

summary.name: Software Development Reference
summary.description: Learn about some of the scripts that upload the data via cron jobs and how to fix things when things go wrong
